page.title: 09Sandwiches at school
page.content:
Rupert Sliwa and David Walker decided to do Bentfield C/P school dinners. We have 3 choices of what we want to do for dinner, we can go home for dinner, take sandwiches or have school dinners. Rupert decided to do school dinners so I did sandwiches. I went round asking people what they had in their lunch boxes and compiled an average lunch using the most popular foods, it cosisted of:-
Sandwiches Crisps A chocolate biscuit And a drink (usualy orange or lemon.)
About 17 children in our class have a packed lunch.
